productdescription: Cuprinol Naturally Enhancing Teak Oil Clear offers a natural finish for teak and similar hardwoods. It protects and enhances the wood by replacing the natural oils lost through weathering, helping to restore the appearance of old furniture and maintain the colour and appearance of new furniture.

productname: Cuprinol Ducksback 5L Harvest Brown
productdescription: Advanced, wax enriched and non-drip formulation, that colours and weatherproofs sheds and fences for up to 5 years. Cuprinol 5 year Ducksback is quick drying, low odour and safe to use around plants and pets.

productname: Cuprinol Ducksback 5L Forest Oak
productdescription: Advanced, wax enriched and non-drip formulation, that colours and weatherproofs sheds and fences for up to 5 years. Cuprinol 5 year Ducksback is quick drying, low odour and safe to use around plants and pets.

productname: Ronseal Fence Life Plus 5L Matt Shed & Fence Treatment Charcoal Grey
productdescription: Ronseal Fence Life Plus gives 5 year protection on all rough sawn and smooth planed sheds and fences. It'll protect the wood from rain, frost and snow and won't lose it's colour in the sun. It can be applied by brush or using a sprayer and can also be applied to damp wood.

productname: Cuprinol Anti-Slip Decking Stain 2.5L American Mahogany
productdescription: Cuprinol's anti-slip decking stain is water-based and suitable for all softwood and hardwood decking. Its double action formula contains invisible anti-slip microbeads, making the deck safer and helping protect the film surface from green algae and mould growth.

productdescription: Adds colour and weather protection to sheds and fences in just one coat. Increased wax for superior water repellency and UV protection for long lasting colour.

productname: 4Trade 5L Pressure Sprayer with Mannometer
productdescription: 5L Pressure Sprayer is designed to be used with sprayable timbercare

productname: Cuprinol Decking Oil 5L Natural
productdescription: Cuprinol UV Guard Decking Oil can be used to penetrate into wood to replace natural oils and resins lost through weathering. Its tinted formula revitalises the colour of weathered wood.

productname: 4Trade Creocote 4L Dark Brown
productdescription: Creocote is an oil based wood treatment. Formulated to be effective when applied to exterior timbers such as garden sheds, fences and trellis work, improving surface water repellency to restrict weather damage.

productname: Cuprinol Anti-Slip Deck 2.5L Stain Slate
productdescription: This durable urban slate deck stain from Cuprinol is formulated for all types of timber decking and has a rich semi-transparent colour. Infused with invisible anti-slip microbeads for safety and an algicide for film surface protection against green algae and mould, it has an ultra-tough, scuff-resistant and non-slip finish.

productname: Cuprinol Anti-Slip Decking Stain 2.5L Hampshire Oak
productdescription: A rich semi-transparent colour with a tough durable finish. It has a unique double action formulation which has invisible anti-slip microbeads to make decks safer than untreated wood and an algicide to help protect the film surface from green algae and mould growth.

productname: Pressure Treated Timber Decking Board 29mm x 124mm x 4.8m (Finished Size 26mm x 120 mm x 4.8m)
productdescription: Manufactured from Scandinavian redwood pine, this decking board is easy to maintain and is high pressure treated with Tanalith 'E' to ensure durability, providing a 15 year service life.

productname: Pressure Treated Timber Decking Board 29mm x 124mm x 3m (Finished Size 26mm x 120 mm x 3m)
productdescription: Manufactured from Scandinavian redwood pine, this decking board is easy to maintain and is high pressure treated with Tanalith 'E' to ensure durability, providing a 15 year service life.

productname: Cuprinol Wood Preserver 5L Clear
productdescription: A colourless general-purpose preserver for interior or exterior use. It gives deep penetrating protection to sound wood against decay, mould and blue-staining fungi. It has also been developed with a low odour formula to make it more pleasant and convenient to use.

productname: Cuprinol 5 Star Complete Wood Treatment 5L
productdescription: A clear, low odour, water based, all purpose treatment, to prevent insect attack, re-infestation and protect from fungal decay. Also protects against wet rot, dry rot and woodworm. Coverage rate of 3.5 to 5m2 per litre (typically requires 2-3 uniform coats).

productname: Cuprinol Woodworm Killer Water-Based 5L
productdescription: A clear water-based low odour formulation that kills all types of woodworm. Its deep penetration prevents re-infestation and ensures effective protection for years to come. Do not use on beehives or bee keeping equipment.

productname: 4Trade Creocote Sub Light Brown 4L
productdescription: Creocote is an oil based wood treatment. Formulated to be effective when applied to exterior timbers such as garden sheds, fences and trellis work, improving surface water repellency to restrict weather damage.

productname: Cuprinol 5 Star Complete Wood Treatment 2.5L
productdescription: A clear, low odour, water based, all purpose treatment to prevent insect attack, re-infestation and protect from fungal decay.

productname: Deck-Tite Green Deck Screw 50mm Qty 500
productdescription: Deck-Tite's unique thread pitch to core size ratio offers the perfect balance between ease of insertion and pull-out retention whilst increasing the core's sheer strength to match the thread pitch.  It is a tri-lock thread which forms, not cuts, a thread in the material, expanding the wood around the screw, ensuring a tight and secure fix. This thread is formed by forming a thread in the material, not cutting it. There will be no movement of the screw once it has been driven in.

Through 4CUT, SPAX eliminates predrilling, ensuring a fast and secure fastening.  The T-STAR Plus head's square end pushes wood fibre aside, reducing screw-in torque.

productdescription: Flexseal Adaptor Couplings, sometimes referred to as reducer couplings, are designed to connect unadopted drainage pipes with different outside diameters ï¿½ connecting larger drainage pipes to smaller drainage pipes and vice versa. Conforms to standard EN295-4

productname: Flexseal DC115 Drain Coupling 100-115
productdescription: Flexseal Drain Couplings, sometimes referred to as couplers, are simple, easy to use drainage pipe connectors. Drain Couplings are designed to connect two pipes with the same or similar outside diameter.

productname: Flexseal SC120 Standard Coupling 105-120
productdescription: Shear banded couplings are a requirement of the UK water companies when connecting onto their assets. This requirement forms part of Water Industry Specification (WIS) 4-41-01, which outlines the requirements to connect pipes on adopted systems using only shear banded couplings. The shear band gives the connection added protection against shear loads that could cause the pipes to become mis-aligned.

productname: Flexseal AC1602 Adaptor Coupling 144-160/110-122
productdescription: Flexseal Adaptor Couplings, sometimes referred to as reducer couplings, are designed to connect unadopted drainage pipes with different outside diameters Ð connecting larger drainage pipes to smaller drainage pipes and vice versa. Conforms to standard EN295-4

productdescription: Shear banded couplings are a requirement of the UK water companies when connecting onto their assets. This requirement forms part of Water Industry Specification (WIS) 4-41-01, which outlines the requirements to connect pipes on adopted systems using only shear banded couplings. This product is the standard leg (JHA270) version and can be installed directly on the bearing joist or wrapped over the top to achieve higher performance.

productname: Rockwool RWA45 50mm Acoustic Insulation Slab 1200mm x 600mm 6.48m2/ Pack
productdescription: Rockwool RWA45 Insulation Slabs are a high quality resin bonded slab that can be used in a variety of applications including; floors, walls, roofs, and industrial applications. This product comes in a pack of 9.

productname: Rockwool RWA45 Semi-Rigid Acoustic Insulation Slab 100mm x 1200mm x 600mm (2.88m2 pack)
productdescription: This pack of Rockwool semi-rigid acoustic insulation slabs contains resin bonded slabs that can be used in general building and industrial applications, including as thermal insulation on floors, walls and roofs. They provide A1 fire protection and are finished with a water repellent seal to prevent decay from moisture .

productname: Rockwool Sound Insulation Slab 1200 x 400 x 100mm (2.88m2)
productdescription:
Designed for use in separating internal walls and floors, ROCKWOOL Sound Insulation Slab reduces noise from adjacent properties and between rooms in the same homes, as well as providing exceptional fire resistance.
Made from stone, ROCKWOOL insulation absorbs sound and reduces sound vibrations due to its density, non-directional fibre orientation and its open porus structure; trapping and preventing sound waves from travelling through it.
ROCKWOOL insulation is non-combustable, and able to withstand temperatures up to 1,000 degrees centergrade. ROCKWOOL insulation acts like a fire barrier, improving the safety of occupants and protecting property and contents in the event of a fire.

productname: Rockwool Sound Insulation Slab 1200 x 600 x 50mm (8.64m2)
productdescription:
Designed for use in separating internal walls and floors, ROCKWOOL Sound Insulation Slab reduces noise from adjacent properties and between rooms in the same homes, as well as providing exceptional fire resistance.
Made from stone, ROCKWOOL insulation absorbs sound and reduces sound vibrations due to its density, non-directional fibre orientation and its open porus structure; trapping and preventing sound waves from travelling through it.
ROCKWOOL insulation is non-combustable, and able to withstand temperatures up to 1,000 degrees centergrade. ROCKWOOL insulation acts like a fire barrier, improving the safety of occupants and protecting property and contents in the event of a fire.

productname: Rockwool Sound Insulation Slab 1200 x 600 x 100mm (4.32m²)
productdescription: Designed for use in separating and internal walls and floors, ROCKWOOL Sound Insulation Slab both reduces noise from adjacent properties and between rooms in the same homes, as well as providing exceptional fire resistance. Made from stone, Rockwool insulation absorbs sound and reduces sound vibrations due to its density, non-directional fibre orientation and its open porous structure; trapping and preventing sound waves from travelling through it. ROCKWOOL insulation is non-combustible, and able to withstand temperatures up to 1,000 degrees centigrade. ROCKWOOL insulation acts like a fire barrier, improving the safety of occupants and protecting property and contents in the event of a fire.

productname: Rockwool Ablative Coated Batt 50mm x 1200mm x 600mm 0.72m2/ Pack

This product has been tested for its airtightness performance and requires no maintenance once installed. This comes in a pack of 1.

productname: British Gypsum Gyproc Easi-Fill 60 Two Coat Joint Filler Compound 10kg
productdescription: The Gyproc Easi-Fill joint filler is easy to mix and apply, providing a consistently smooth finish. It creates a lightweight product that can be beneficial for those quick fix jobs.

productdescription: Gyproc Ready Mix Joint Cement is a ready mixed air-drying jointing material for all stages of plasterboard jointing

productdescription: Gyproc Joint filler is a setting material intended to be used with bulk and secondary filling of plasterboard joints. productdescription: A general-purpose plastic access panel. Ideal for plasterboard and wood backgrounds, providing easy access to hidden services in residential as well as commercial projects.

productdescription: A general purpose, liquid mortar plasticiser and improver for brick and blockwork mortars.

productname: Sika 1 Integral Liquid Waterproofer 5L
productdescription: Sika®-1 Waterproofer is an aqueous solution containing complex colloidal silicates. In the presence of water these swell and block the capillaries and pores in the applied sand/cement renders, screeds and mortar to provide an effective barrier against the transmission of liquid water.

productname: Sika Maxmix Cement Colour Red 1L
productdescription: Sika MaxMix Colour is a concentrated solution of pigments, suitable for brick laying, paving, renders, grouts and screeds. 1 litre treats up to 400kg of mortar.

productname: Eazymix Extratime Plaster Retarder
productdescription: Extend the setting time of all types of finishing plaster by up to 60 minutes.

productname: Sika 2 Waterplug Leak Sealing Admixture 5L
productdescription: Sika®-2 Water Plug is a ready to use very rapid setting leak stopping liquid which is mixed with ordinary portland cement to produce a paste for immediate leak sealing against high water pressure infiltration.

productname: Cementone Freeflo Plasticiser 5L
productdescription: Cementone Freeflo Plasticiser is a retarding waterproofer and plasticiser

productname: Eazymix Halftime Plaster Accelerator
productdescription: Reduce the setting time of all types of finishing plaster by up to 60 minutes.

productname: Sika Wintermix 5LTR
productdescription: Sika Wintermix Admixture is an air entraining, chloride free, liquid admixture for mortar and concrete which also acts as an accelerator for work in sub - zero temperatures, with increased frost resistance during setting. Sika Wintermix improves workability, even in cold weather as well as freeze/thaw resistance in bricklaying mortars, thus eliminating the need for a separate frost proofer. Sika Wintermix can be used as an air entraining, water reducing, admixture and accelerator/frost proofer for brick and block laying mortar, render (internal and external) and concrete Sika Wintermix is also suitable for load bearing brickwork, block laying, external and internal rendering, pointing/repointing brickwork and floor screeds. Due to the embedded metal, Sika Wintermix is non-corrosive to embedded metal and can also replace Lime in the mix, reducing the possibility of lime bloom and efflorescence. Sika Wintermix also benefits from reduced shrinkage, with in turn reduces cracking and crazing.

productname: Sika 4 Rapid Setting Liquid Admixture 5L
productdescription: Sika-4 Rapid Setting is a ready to use liquid for accelerating the set time of concretes and renders where low water pressure or slow water movement exists.

productname: Setcrete Latex Floor Levelling Compound 20kg T0603E5A
productdescription: Setcrete™ Latex is a floor levelling compound for use in light to medium traffic internal areas prior to the installation of new floorcoverings. It is suitable for use over a wide range of absorbent and non-absorbent subfloor types providing they are sound, well adhered, and suitably prepared.

productname: Setcrete Deep Base Floor Levelling Compound 20kg 346361
productdescription: A high strength, high performance floor levelling compound that is designed to raise floor levels and to smooth uneven floors in conservatories and extensions.

productname: Ka Tanking Slurry Waterproofing Solution Grey 25kg
productdescription: KA Tanking Slurry is the complete crystalline solution to waterproofing masonry and blockwork. Ideal for internal and external use as a waterproof render, it is suitable for use on walls prior to plastering and on floors prior to self-levelling. Designed to function against water penetration in various conditions, it can be used in foundation slabs, tunnels, irrigation channels, bathrooms, kitchens and so on.

productname: Sika 4A Waterstop Leak Sealing Admixture 5L
productdescription: Sika 4a Waterstop is a rapid setting, ready to use waterproofing admixture which can be used to produce a paste for leak stopping against high water pressure infiltration when mixed with water and ordinary Portland cement.

productname: Sika Maxmix Waterproofer 1L
productdescription: Sika MaxMix Waterproofer is a liquid admixture for pointing, renders and screeds. It can be used in all situations where resistance to water is required such as screeds, renders, pointing and mortars. 1 litre treats up to 250kg of cement.

productname: Sika Frosterproofer 1L
productdescription: Sika MaxMix Frostproofer & Accelerator is a liquid admixture for mortars and concrete. It can be used in all situations where reduced setting time is required. For working at temperatures down to -2 degrees. 1 litre treats up to 100kg of cement.

productname: Liquid Science Viscosan Toilet Descaler and Cleaner 1 Litre
productdescription: A concentrated, perfumed, thick toilet cleaner and descaler which quickly removes scale and organic stains from urinals and bowls and pleasant to use

productname: Liquid Science CLEAR-A-DRAIN 1 Litre
productdescription: A radical chemical blend containing a sophisticated mixture of alkaline materials and wetting agents to attack varied types of blockages whether caused by hair, grease, fat, oils, etc.. Heavier than water the unique formula holds the active chemicals together, allowing them to sink to the source of the problem with minimum loss of activity.

productname: Blue Circle Mastercrete Grey Cement in Plastic Bag 25kg
productdescription: Mastercrete contains cement quality improver to give the following benefits compared with ordinary Portland cement: lower water demand, more cohesive mix, less tendency for water to segregate and bleed and enhanced resistance of hardened concrete or mortar to freeze/thaw attack. Mastercrete is also 39% better for the environment. Comes in a convenient weatherproof plastic bag.

productname: Blue Circle General Purpose Grey Cement in Paper Bag 25kg
productdescription: This cement bag from Blue Circle provides a multi-purpose cement suitable for a wide range of standard uses, including concrete, mortar, rendering and screeds. It is compatible with a wide range of admixtures such as air-entraining agents, workability aids and pigments.

productname: Blue Circle Ready to Use Postcrete 20kg
productdescription: This Blue Circle ready to use Postcrete is a ready-mix Portland cement with a blend of selected sand, cement and additives formulated for fixing all kinds wooden, concrete and metal posts. It comes in a convenient weatherproof and tear-resistant plastic bag. Easy to use just add to water. Rapid setting (around 5 to 10 minutes), No mixing required

productname: Blue Circle Snowcrete White Cement 25kg
productdescription: Snowcrete is a white cement and is used for architectural uses, providing attractive and durable concrete, rendering and mortar. Uses include cast stone, architectural precast concrete, paving slabs, street furniture and terrazzo. Snowcrete on the UK Mainland is a High Strength CEM I 52,5R. Note to produce a white finish you must also use a white sand and/or aggregate

productname: Blue Circle Hydralime Hydrated Lime 25kg
productdescription: Hydralime may be used with Procem, Mastercrete, General Purpose Cement, Snowcrete and Sulfacrete. Hydralime improves the cohesion, workability, plasticity and long term durability of Mortars and Renders when used. Note that as Hydralime is non-hydraulic, it is not suitable for use in mortars and renders without a Portland cement.

productname: Blue Circle Quality Assured Ready to Use Mortar 20kg
productdescription: Pre-mixed and ready to use with the addition of clean water, M4 (designation III) 1:1:6 cement:hydrated lime:sand mortar. Comprising specially graded sand, lime and admixtures this Blue Circle mortar offers convenience, with no compromise in performance or quality. Weather resistant and durable, this mortar is suitable for most general brick and block applications. Also ideal for pointing or gable ends. The mix is highly workable and cohesive, with a long board life.

productname: Ulti-Mate® Stick-Fit® Wood Screws Trade Assortment Qty 1000
productdescription:
These high-performance Ulti-Mate® wood screws are built for strength. Featuring a patented PSD® drive system to enable smooth, stable driving and Stick-Fit® one-handed installation, this trade pack includes 1,000 screws in five sizes from 25-70mm.
A thick core diameter ensures superior strength throughout the body of the screw, and also under the head area. With a sharp point and prominent thread at the tip, you’ll get a rapid start and immediate thread engagement – this saves time and effort, helping you drive more screws per charge if using a cordless tool.
A slotted shank reduces wood splitting, and a countersunk head complete with ribs ensures a flush finish. Screws 40mm and shorter don’t have the ribs, to make them hinge-compatible. As well as five popular sizes, the pack also includes five Stick-Fit® driver bits. A high-quality Stick-Fit driver bit is included in every single box of Ulti-Mate Wood Screws. The screws also feature a type-17 point to drive through the hardest timber, a double-angle countersunk head for a neat finish and a wide, deep single thread for rapid insertion and strong holding power.

productname: ForgeFix Screw Assortment & Case 1500pc
productdescription:
The ForgeFix 1500pc Multi-Purpose Assorted Single Thread Screws case contains a variety of popular sizes, countersunk heads, and zinc yellow passivation for extra durability and corrosion resistance.

Useful in all trades, including joinery, electrical, and plumbing. Suitable for DIY applications as well. Includes the following, in a convenient organiser case:

productname: ForgeFix Multi-Purpose Screw 5.0 x 100mm ZYP Qty 100
productdescription: The Forgefix 5.0 x 100mm multi-purpose woodscrews feature countersunk heads with zinc yellow passivation for extra durability. Suitable for fixing into softwoods, hardwoods, chipboards, and fibreboards, single-thread screws are highly versatile and popular. This screw can be used in a wide variety of ironmongery, joinery, electrical, and plumbing applications.

productdescription: The Forgefix 5.0 x 70mm multi-purpose woodscrews feature countersunk heads with zinc yellow passivation for extra durability. productname: Deck-Tite Green Deck Screw 50mm Qty 500
productdescription: Deck-Tite's unique thread pitch to core size ratio offers the perfect balance between ease of insertion and pull-out retention whilst increasing the core's sheer strength to match the thread pitch.  It is a tri-lock thread which forms, not cuts, a thread in the material, expanding the wood around the screw, ensuring a tight and secure fix. This thread is formed by forming a thread in the material, not cutting it. There will be no movement of the screw once it has been driven in.

productname: Ulti-Mate Stick-Fit Wood Screws  4.0 x 40mm Qty 1000
productdescription: The Ulti-Mate Wood Screw is a trade-quality, high-performance woodscrew that can be used for fixing hardwood, softwood, man-made timber boards (e.g. MDF, plywood, chipboard & OSB), and sheet metal. 2x high-quality Stick-Fit driver bits are included in every single trade tub of Ulti-Mate Wood Screws. The screws also feature a type-17 point to drive through the hardest timber, a double-angle countersunk head for a neat finish and a wide, deep single thread for rapid insertion and strong holding power.

productname: Bostik MC250 Vitri-Flex Rapid Set White Wall & Floor Tile Adhesive 20kg
productdescription:
Bostik MC250 Vitri-Flex is a fast-setting, flexible wall and floor tile adhesive in white. It is suitable for bonding ceramic tiles, quarry tiles, porcelain, vitrified tiles, natural stone and mosaics to wall and floors.

This white, rapid-setting wall and floor tile adhesive is formulated for fast track installation and enables tiles to be grouted in approximately 2 to 3 hours after fixing, depending on conditions. It provides excellent grip and adhesion.

Bostik Vitri-Flex tile adhesive is suitable for most interior and exterior installations including more demanding installations, such as use with underfloor heating and areas subject to limited vibration. When fully cured the adhesive is suitable for permanently wet areas such as showers. It will bond to concrete, plaster, sand/cement render and screeds, blockwork, brickwork, glazed surfaces, vinyl tiles, plywood overlay and more.

One of Bostik's best adhesives for vitrified tiles. Available in a 20kg bag.

productname: Mapei Keraflex Non Rapid White Adhesive 20kg
productdescription: Cement based adhesive with fair deformability, good adhesion strength and no vertical slip, ideal for ceramic tiles and stone materials.

productname: Mapei Ultracolor White Water Proof Grout Alupak 5kg
productdescription: Ultracolor Plus grout can be used to enhance wall or floor tiled finishes both internally and externally with many added benefits such as anti-mould and water repellent features as well as being available in a wide range of colours. Suitable for use with almost all types of tile/mosaic. Not for use with metallic tiles or tiles with a soft glaze – if in doubt carry out a small trial area.

productname: Mapeker Rapid Setting Flexible Grey Tile Adhesive 20kg
productdescription: Mapeker grey is a rapid setting cement-based adhesive for fixing a wide variety of ceramic, porcelain and mosaic tiles. Recommended also for fixing dark colour stone such as slate and black granite.

productname: UniBond 12.8kg Ultraforce Wall Adhesive & Grout - White
productdescription: Use the Unibond Wall Tile Adhesive and Grout for ultimate durability. Drying time is 24 hours and it is suitable for ceramic, porcelain and mosaic surfaces.

productname: Mapeker Rapid Setting Flexible White Tile Adhesive 20kg
productdescription: Mapeker white is a rapid setting cement-based adhesive for fixing a wide variety of ceramic, porcelain and mosaic tiles. Recommended also for fixing light colour stone.

productname: Mapestik 949270 Ready Mix Non Waterproof Wall Tile Adhesive 15kg
productdescription: Mapestik is a budget adhesive for fixing porous bodied glazed wall tiles in internal domestic or light duty commercial installations. Where a ready mixed adhesive is required for showers use Mapegrip D2.

productname: Mapei Ultracolour Grey Water Proof Grout Alupak 113 5kg
productdescription: Ultracolor Plus grout can be used to enhance wall or floor tiled finishes both internally and externally with many added benefits such as anti-mould and water repellent features as well as being available in a wide range of colours. Suitable for use with almost all types of tile/mosaic. Not for use with metallic tiles or tiles with a soft glaze – if in doubt carry out a small trial area.

productname: Evo-Stick 30812633 Waterproof Wall Tile Adhesive 10L Natural
productdescription:
Evo-Stick Waterproof Wall Tile Adhesive is a ready-mixed, mould-resistant, waterproof tile adhesive suitable for fixing ceramic wall tiles to most types of sound, and interior surfaces.

As the adhesive is waterproof, it is ideal for use in areas subject to infrequent wetting and condensation, such as kitchen and bathroom walls. This showerproof wall tile adhesive can also be applied directly onto existing tiles for convenience.

Suitable materials: Suitable for fixing onto most internal surfaces including plaster, plasterboard, glazed tiles, brick, cement, cement renders, and tile backer boards.

Suitable tiles: For fixing ceramic wall tiles.

Available as a 10L waterproof wall tile adhesive. The adhesive is supplied in a post-consumer recycled (PCR) bucket to reduce the impact of the product on the environment.

productname: Evo-Stick 30812629 Instant Grab Wall Tile Adhesive 10L Natural
productdescription:
Evo-Stick Instant Grab Wall Tile Adhesive is a fast-acting, ready-mixed tile adhesive for fixing ceramic wall tiles on dry, internal walls. Its showerproof properties make it a suitable wall tile adhesive for areas subject to some splashing and condensation, such as kitchens and bathrooms.

The instant tile adhesive is easy to use and can be used to tile onto most substrates, including existing tiles. 

Suitable materials: For fixing onto most internal surfaces including plaster, plasterboard, glazed tiles, brick, cement, cement renders, and tile backer boards.

Suitable tiles: Ceramic wall tiles

Available as a 10L instant grab tile adhesive. The adhesive is supplied in a post-consumer recycled (PCR) bucket to reduce the product's impact on the environment.

productname: Evo-Stick Mould Resistance White Wall & Tile Grout 1.5kg
productdescription: Evo-Stick Mould Resistant Wall Tile Grout is a fast-setting and mould resistant cement-based grout that is suitable for finishing joints in internal and external ceramic tile installations. When set, it is completely waterproof and will not wash out of joints, making it ideal for use in areas subject to frequent wetting and condensation such as power showers, kitchens and bathrooms.

productname: Evo-Stick 30812628 Instant Grab Wall Tile Adhesive 5L Natural

productname: Grabo Pro-Lifter 20 Cordless Digital Vacuum Lifter with Battery & Charger GRAB300
productdescription:
"The GRABO Pro is our most advanced vacuum lifter, perfect for the safe and easy handling of Tiles, Paving Slabs, Glass, Sheet Metal, Wood, Doors, Sheet Materials, Rough Concrete, Plasterboard, and even Household Appliances and Furniture. Designed with ergonomics in mind, it ensures improved grip and reduced fatigue during the handling of heavy objects.

Equipped with a smart digital pressure sensor, a digital display, and intelligent weight and pressure settings, the GRABO Pro offers enhanced functionality. With the inclusion of an auto on/off switch, the GRABO Pro continuously monitors and maintains the optimal suction level, activating or deactivating as needed. The smart digital gauge provides a visual grip indication, displaying both bar/PSI measurements and the maximum weight that the GRABO Pro can safely lift in kilograms or pounds, ensuring safe and efficient operations.

The Grabo Pro comes fully equipped with a tough zipped carry case, standard seal, battery, and charger"

The all-metal gear case ensures optimal gear seating to prolong service life. The tool offers four operational modes: rotary hammer, hammer only, rotation only, and variolock, allowing for enhanced versatility. The Anti-Vibration System is designed to minimize vibration, thereby maximizing user comfort. Additionally, individual battery cell monitoring is implemented to optimize tool runtime and ensure the longevity of the battery pack.

The electronic clutch reduces the kick back reaction in the event of a pinch or stall. Its electronic brake stops the wheel quickly when the trigger is released for improved work safety and control. The mesh covers restrict dust from being sucked into the motor, improving the tools life. The two position handle provides greater versatility in confined spaces. (Battery Not Included)

The RAPIDSTOP™ technology ensures the quickest disc braking, achieving cessation in under 2 seconds for enhanced user safety. The non-lockable safety paddle switch features a line-lock-out function to inhibit unintentional start-up, complemented by an anti-vibration side handle to minimize user fatigue. Additionally, the integrated FIXTEC™ system facilitates tool-free wheel changes.

productdescription: Labyrinth construction protects all ball bearings from dust and debris, its armature is coated with a protective varnish and field coated with powder varnish to protect the motor from dust and wire breakage. This ensures maximum durability for masonry cutting.

productdescription: Body only 115mm Angle Grinder for cutting & grinding applications with the convenience of cordless. Accepts Makita 18V LXT battery. Electronic overload for safety & protection of machine and battery. Soft grip for comfort in use. Comes complete with sde handle.

productname: Grabo Rockseal Foam Seal GRAB109
productdescription: The RockSeal is made from durable, extra-thick foam, allowing it to form a strong seal around uneven material. RockSeal is compatible with all GRABO models and can be swapped from the standard GRABO seal in seconds.

productname: Grabo Pro-Lifter 20 Cordless Digital Vacuum Lifter with Battery & Charger GRAB300
productdescription:
"The GRABO Pro is our most advanced vacuum lifter, perfect for the safe and easy handling of Tiles, Paving Slabs, Glass, Sheet Metal, Wood, Doors, Sheet Materials, Rough Concrete, Plasterboard, and even Household Appliances and Furniture. Designed with ergonomics in mind, it ensures improved grip and reduced fatigue during the handling of heavy objects.

Equipped with a smart digital pressure sensor, a digital display, and intelligent weight and pressure settings, the GRABO Pro offers enhanced functionality. With the inclusion of an auto on/off switch, the GRABO Pro continuously monitors and maintains the optimal suction level, activating or deactivating as needed. The smart digital gauge provides a visual grip indication, displaying both bar/PSI measurements and the maximum weight that the GRABO Pro can safely lift in kilograms or pounds, ensuring safe and efficient operations.

The Grabo Pro comes fully equipped with a tough zipped carry case, standard seal, battery, and charger"

productname: STANLEY FATMAX TradeLift
productdescription: The STANLEY FATMAX TradeLift is a versatile handheld tool for lifting, levelling, holding and spreading of heavy or awkward objects such as appliances, sheet materials or furniture ï¿½ a real life saver when you're working alone. Engineered for safety, this professional, heavy-duty tool enables easy hands-free lifting up to 150kg, to a maximum height of 220mm. The TradeLiftï¿½ is perfect for jobs like hanging doors, installing kitchen cabinets and appliances and fitting windows in all environments, with enclosed metal plate housing to enhance durability and prevent dust entering the tool. The robust lifting tool can be operated by hand or foot, with an ergonomic overmoulded handle providing extra grip, comfort, and control. A fine adjuster lowers the load by up to 2.5mm per toggle for precision levelling and spacing, with a full release button safely recessed to avoid accidental activation. The large base plate with angled edge slides easily under low objects and reduces the risk of tipping, with four screwholes countersunk into the base to anchor the lift for maximum stability.

productname: DeWalt 18V XR Li-ion Cordless Jigsaw - Body Only DCS331N-XJ
productdescription: The DeWalt 18V XR Li-ion Jigsaw is part of the intelligent XR lithium-ion platform designed for efficiency and making applications faster. The powerful and highly efficient fan cooled motor with replaceable brushes, delivers up to 3000 strokes per minute, making cutting applications faster. The 3 sided pendulum action feature controls the aggressiveness and smoothness of cuts.

productname: Milwaukee M18™ SAWZALL™ Reciprocating Saw (Body Only)
productdescription: The Milwaukee M18™ SAWZALL™ Reciprocating Saw (body only) is equipped with a high-performance 4-pole motor that optimizes power output while enhancing the power-to-weight ratio. It features a counterbalance mechanism that minimizes vibrations to 15.2 m/s in wooden beams. The saw includes a patented FIXTEC™ clamp for rapid and tool-free blade changes. With a stroke length of 28.6 mm and a cutting speed of 3000 strokes per minute, it facilitates exceptionally rapid cutting operations.

productname: Milwaukee M18 FUEL™ Top Handle Jigsaw
productdescription: The Milwaukee M18 FUEL™ Top Handle Jigsaw is equipped with a dust blower that clears the cutting line of wood debris. It features a keyless bevel adjustment mechanism on the base plate, enabling angles between 0° and 45°, as well as a patented FIXTEC™ blade clamp for quick and efficient blade replacement. The tool incorporates a 5-stage pendulum action to enhance cutting performance and is powered by a Brushless POWERSTATE™ motor, which facilitates rapid cutting, extends tool longevity, and achieves cuts up to 32 meters in 19mm OSB when using a 5.0 Ah battery pack. Additionally, an integrated LED light provides illumination for the workspace.

productname: Makita 110V 235mm Circular Saw 5903RK/1
productdescription: Makita 5903RK/1 is a 110 volt circular saw with a 235mm blade capable of cutting up to 85mm. Soft start and electric brake features, supplied in carry case.

productname: Stanley Junior Sawhorse Twin Pack
productdescription: Sawhorse Twin Pack - maximum load 170kg

productname: Milwaukee M18™ Planer (Body Only)
productdescription: The Milwaukee M18™ Planer (Body Only) features an adjustable cutting depth ranging from 0 to 2 mm, equipped with twenty discrete locking positions for precise material removal settings. It offers a rebate depth capability of up to 10.7 mm. The unit is powered by a high-performance 4-pole motor, capable of a maximum speed of 14,000 rpm, ensuring optimal surface finishing. Enhanced material removal efficiency is achieved through the use of two double-edged carbide blades across a planning width of 82 mm. Additionally, the planer is designed for left or right chip ejection, allowing for improved user visibility and comfort during operation.

productname: Milwaukee M18 FUEL™ Trim Router
productdescription: The Milwaukee M18 FUEL™ Trim Router is equipped with a POWERSTATE™ brushless motor that provides performance equivalent to AC trim routers, achieving a maximum rotational speed of 31,000 RPM for efficient and smooth material cutting. The unit features a variable speed dial that enables users to select operating speeds ranging from 10,000 to 31,000 RPM, facilitating optimal control for diverse applications. Its operational efficiency is enhanced by an extended runtime per charge, utilizing an M18™ 5.0 Ah battery, capable of performing up to 115 meters of trimming work. Additionally, the router incorporates an innovative height adjustment mechanism with 0.4 mm micro adjustment increments. The active brake system ensures rapid deceleration of the router upon command.

productname: Milwaukee M18™ Wet / Dry Vacuum (Body Only)
productdescription: The Milwaukee M18™ Wet/Dry Vacuum (Body Only) is equipped with a robust 18V motor, achieving a maximum airflow rate of 1300 L/min and an operating pressure of 80 bar, resulting in significant suction capabilities for both wet and dry cleaning applications. The integrated HEPA filter is capable of capturing 99.97% of airborne particles as small as 0.03 microns, ensuring effective fine dust collection. Additionally, the vacuum features a waterproof switch designed to mitigate the risk of switch damage throughout the tool's operational lifespan.

productname: V-TUF 240V M Class Mini Dust Extraction Vaccum Cleaner
productdescription: The V-TÜF M CLASS MINI helps you tackle dust at the source. Connect it directly to your power tools or sweep up and enjoy a dust-free environment. The V-TÜF®M CLASS MINI is M-Class Rated, the ‘Minimum Requirement’ for construction sites. Unrated vacuum cleaners are extremely dangerous as respirable dust can pass through the motor and be pumped back into the air. This dust then remains airborne for up to 8 hours, where it can be inhaled directly into your lung chamber, where it will remain forever. Approximately 700 people in the UK die every year due to illness relating to the inhalation of respirable dust. Needless to say, this dust also damages your vacuum motor. The V-TÜF®M CLASS MINI offers you affordable compliance and protection from common dust-related health issues! The new M CLASS MINI is a keystone that helps V-TUF achieve its mission: To save and improve the lives of those in their line of duty. Ideal for: Construction & woodworking Industries. No reason to not embrace the M Class protection.

productname: DeWalt XR 18V Cordless 3 Speed Brushless Li-Ion Impact Driver Wrench - Body Only DCF887N-XJ
productdescription: High power Brushless motor outputting up to 205Nm of torque ensures heavy applications are completed quickly Application control is achieved through 3 motor speeds and torque settings including PrecisionDrive. PrecisionDrive mode offers additional control in screwdriving applications to avoid material and fastener damage Super lightweight and compact the tool is very comfortable to use and fits in small spaces 3x LED "Halo" light ring offers excellent workpiece lighting Compatible with all DEWALT 18V XR battery packs 1/4" (6.35mm) ‘drop in‘ bit holder allows for quick, one handed fitment

productname: Makita 18V LXT Brushless Impact Driver Body Only DTD153Z
productdescription: Makita is the leading manufacturer of professional power tools on the market.  The DTD153 Impact Driver features  Makita's Brushless Motor, giving both longer life and greater power.  Compact in design, and packing an impressive 170Nm maximum fastening torque, powered by 18V Li-ion batteries, ensuring reliability and performance.

productname: DeWalt 2 Way Cross Line Laser Level
productdescription: The DeWalt Cross Line Laser can project bright crossing horizontal and vertical lines to suit various levelling and layout applications. Designed to deliver maximum brightness for increased visibility while working in low light or dark conditions. It has a total working range extending to almost 165ft with indoor visibility of 100ft. Built in magnetic pivot bracket mounts easily on metal surfaces.

productname: Milwaukee USB Rechargeable Green Cross Line Laser
productdescription: The Milwaukee USB Rechargeable Green Cross Line Laser is equipped with high-intensity green beams, delivering a operational range of 30 meters, which can extend up to 100 meters when used with a detector. It is powered by a rechargeable and removable REDLITHIUM™ USB 3.0 Ah battery, offering a continuous runtime exceeding 8 hours. The device features a three-mode pendulum system: Manual Mode for application at any angle, Self-Levelling Mode that indicates off-level conditions with a self-levelling range of 4 degrees, and Pendulum Lock Mode to safeguard internal components during transit. One REDLITHIUM™ USB 3.0 battery can replace up to 6,000 alkaline batteries over its lifespan, and the device carries an IP54 rating for dust and water resistance.

productname: Faithfull FAIDETDAMP Damp & Moisture Meter LCD Display
productdescription: A Faithfull small pocket sized damp and moisture meter that can be used to measure the moisture content in timber, paper, cardboard and hard materials such as mortar, concrete and plaster. The moisture content is displayed as a percentage reading on the LCD digital display that is equipped with a backlit function for use in dark environments. The meter can also be used to measure the ambient temperature and is compact, portable and easy to use. The meter is supplied in with a probe cover for safe storage when not in use. Features: Clear easy to read LCD display. Accurate moisture measurement. Works on hard and soft materials. Auto power-off. Low battery indication. 4 x LR44 Batteries included. Probe cover for safe storage. SPECIFICATION: Measurement Range: Wood: 6-42%, Material: 0.2-2.0%, Temperature: 0-40 Degrees C. Resolution: Wood: 1%, Material: 0.1%, Temperature: 1 Degrees C/2 Degrees F.Faithfull Tools are made to tradesmens' standards by craftsmen who meet the demanding Faithfull criteria for the design and quality of each individual item. All Faithfull non-electrical tools are guaranteed for a period of FIVE years against faulty materials or workmanship, and any tradesman or regular DIY tool user can be confident that the care and quality control behind every Faithfull product is designed to ensure a long and dependable service. Faithfull tools are ideal for the discerning tool buyer who prefers lower prices than those associated with some well known brands, but who is not prepared to compromise too much, if at all, on product quality and reliability.

productname: DeWalt 18V Xr Brushless Multi-tool Body Only
productdescription: The DeWalt Multi-Tool is a must have for all tool sets. The lightweight, versatile and powerful nature of this product make it great for awkward and hard to reach tasks.

productname: Smart H4MAK Trade Blade Set 4 Piece
productdescription: A great assortment of the four most commonly used multi-tool cutting blades, perfect for most tradesmans everyday cutting needs.

productname: Milwaukee M18™ Multi-Tool (Body Only)
productdescription: The Milwaukee M18™ Multi-Tool (Body Only) features a specialised cutting depth stop adaptor designed to mitigate the risk of over-cutting into materials. It incorporates FIXTEC™ technology for tool-free blade changes, along with a universal blade change adaptor that is compatible with all major competitor blades. The multi-tool provides 12 variable speed settings ranging from 12,000 to 18,000 oscillations per minute, and a 3.4° oscillation arc facilitates the efficient execution of professional tasks across various materials, including metal, wood, and plastic. It delivers up to 50% improved speed and versatility compared to traditional corded solutions for cutting and material removal applications. Additionally, the tool includes a proprietary dust extraction kit that maintains a clean work environment when connected to either an AC or DC dust extraction system, along with an integrated high-intensity LED light for optimal workspace illumination.

productname: Karcher K3 Power Control Pressure Washer
productdescription: Make light work of the toughest tasks with the Karcher K3 Power Control. This machine allows you to switch between surfaces with the accessories, and LCD display trigger gun. From rinsing away everyday mud from delicate paint work, to blasting off stubbron dirt from the patio, this machine can tackle any task, fast.

productname: DeWalt 18V XR Li-ion Brushless Collated Drywall Screwdriver with 2 x 2.0AH Batteries, Charger and Kit Box
productdescription: The DeWalt 18V XR Brushless Drywall Collated Screwdriver with 2 x 2.0Ah Li-Ion Batteries, charger and set of forget nose cone all in a TSTAK II Kit Box. With a Powerful 4400 rpm Brushless motor the drywall screwdriver will drive screws efficiently and effectively offering maximum runtime and a compact tool which is one of the lightest and most compact on the market. Tool Free depth adjustment aswell as the collated head rotates on the tool for quick and easy adjustment in awkward work spaces. Trigger lock on allows users to work without having to pull the trigger

productname: Dewalt 18v Xr Compact Brushless Combi & Impact Drill Twin Pack Dck266m2t-gb
productdescription: DeWalt 18V XR Brushless Twin kit, comprises of Combi Drill and Impact Driver with 2 x 4.0Ah Li-Ion Batteries, Multi-Voltage Charger and TSTAK Kit Box. Brushless motor give extended runtimes by running cooler with no touching parts for less maintenance.

productname: DeWalt 18V Xr Circular Saw Body Only DCS391N-XJ
productdescription: DeWalt 18V XR Circular Saw Bare Unit, high speed output of 5150 rpm and Ultra thin kerf Blade allows for long runtimes. Keyless bevel angle and depth of cut adjustments allows quick adjustments to be made for less down time increasing productivity. Batteries and Charger Sold Separately.

productname: DeWalt 18V Cordless 184mm Li-Ion XR Mitre Saw Body Only Bare DCS365N-XJ
productdescription: This DeWalt DCS365 cordless mitre saw offers professionals superior cordless performance over previous models. It delivers the same outstanding accuracy as that achieved by equivalent corded products together with an exceptional level of precision throughout the lifespan of the tool. Lightweight and comfortable to use, this tool features a compact design for added convenience and ease of portability when transporting.

productname: Dewalt 18v Xr Brushless 1/4in (8mm) Router Fixed & Plunge Bases - Bare Unit
productdescription: The DCW604 cordless router is powered by a brushless motor for enhanced runtime and performance and is compatible with all 18V XR batteries. Featuring variable speed control and supplied with body grip and plunge bases with fine height adjustment for the ultimate versatility in applications. Dual LED lights built into the aluminium housing help illuminate the work piece and provide superior bit visibility.

productname: DeWalt DCS334N-XJ 18V Xr Brushless Jigsaw
productdescription: The DCS334N 18V Brushless Jigsaw from Dewalt. This is an upgrade from the DCS331 with a brushless motor for increased runtime and performance and compatible with over 100 tools in the range. The improved tool free blade change mechanism holds the blade more securely and keeps the blade squarer during use for ultimate precision. Dule LED's and a built in dust blower keep the workpiece free from debris for the most accurate cut or switch to the dual sided Airlock compatible extraction kit.

productname: DeWalt Thin Metal Cutting Discs 115 x 1.0 x 22.2mm
productdescription:
These DeWalt thin discs make cutting metal a walk in the park. They can be used for general grinding and cutting of stainless steel, ferrous and non-ferrous metals. They're also supplied in a pack of 10 so you should have plenty extra for when you need them.
Made with aluminium oxide grains and a reinforced fibreglass backing, these discs ensure long-lasting durability. The versatility of the thin discs also allows you to cut metals for welding and surface preparation. They can be used with both corded and cordless angle grinders, making them suitable for whatever tool you have.
The 1 mm thickness of the disc allows you to achieve fast results while maintaining enough strength for neat and straight cutting. Plus, they're packaged in a durable metal box, so you can store them away without having to worry about them getting damaged.

Its abrasion resistant polyester film coated blade coating provides up to 10 times more resistance to abrasion than a standard lacquered blade, with additional BladeArmor™ coating, reinforcing the first 7.5cm of the blade, the section most vulnerable to wear. The tape measure features a 32mm blade width and an impressive reach of 4.9 metres The TRU-ZERO™ hook helps to achieve precise inner and outer measurements, moving back and forth along the securing rivets. Highly polished chrome case with rubber grip to ensure slip resistant hold to withstand heavy use on the jobsite. The tape comes with a large, protruding oversized multi-catch hook, significantly larger than a conventional hook and protruding on all edges - shaped to hook onto building materials with ease above, below and to either side. The bright yellow STANLEY blade ensures enhanced visibility in most jobsite conditions.

productname: ToughBuilt® Scraper Utility Knife
productdescription: The ToughBuilt® Scraper Utility Knife is an innovative 2-in-1 tool expertly crafted from pro-grade materials. It features a patented mechanism that allows you to transform it from a utility knife to a scraper with a simple press of your thumb. It includes five custom, Universal ToughBuilt Blades that are easily changed with the push of a button, and which are compatible with almost all other utility knives. It does everything a scraper and utility knife does, all in one tool. In scraper-mode you can remove paint, putty, labels and adhesive from windows, mirrors, tile. In knife-mode you can cut carpet, cardboard, plastic, vinyl, rope and more with ease and precision. The rugged, non-slip rubber handle is strong, durable and easy to hold, and the finger-guard ridge helps keep you safe while cutting. It also includes an integrated paint-can opener and a handy lanyard-opening for easy tethering.

productdescription: The ToughBuilt® Reload Utility Knife is an innovative quick-change tool expertly crafted from professional-grade materials with a groundbreaking, patented mechanism that accepts spring-loaded blade magazines and autoloads a fresh blade with the flick of a switch. Replacing worn blades is safe and easy with a blade release button that removes used blades before loading a new one by simply pulling the actuator back and flicking it forward again. With a simple press of the magazine release, a positive, spring-loaded magazine ejector drops the magazine away from the tool or into an open hand. A new magazine can then be loaded inside, making it easy to switch from one type of blade to another in a flash. All Toughbuilt mags have an indicator switch. Positions 1, 2 or 3 remind the Pro what type of blade is loaded in a magazine without having to remove the magazine from a pouch or pocket. The Reload Knife is quality constructed from smooth aluminum alloy and zinc alloy for corrosion resistance. It is wrapped in a rugged, grippy, non-slip soft-touch rubber housing to protect the tool from shocks and drops while creating a more dexterous hand purchase on the instrument. The finger guard helps keep pros safe while cutting tough materials. It includes a five-pack of ToughBuilt universal straight-edge blades and a five-pack of ToughBuilt specialized hook blades that use a smart, precision-milled, proprietary edge design. The straight edge blades work interchangeably with the Reload Knife and the ToughBuilt Scraper Utility Knife or any standard utility knife.

productname: Proguard Hessian Cloth 1.37 x 46m
productdescription:
Made from the Jute plant, hessian fabric is a versatile and affordable material that serves a valuable purpose within the construction industry. Its long bast fibre is spun into coarse, strong threads, producing an open weave hessian cloth that can be utilised for a number of purposes.
Due to its excellent thermal properties, it is often used in the construction industry to protect brickwork, mortar and concrete during the cold period. In summer, hessian can be soaked to stop concrete or cement from drying too quickly.
Whatever you need it for, our stock of hessian cloth roll will suit your needs. Both breathable and biodegradable, this eco-friendly fabric, also known as Jute and burlap, is available in 1.37m x 46m rolls. Each roll of our hessian cloth is single wound.
If this is the item you need, please select your desired quantity and add to your quote or basket today.

Perma-White® mould resistant interior paint contains a biocode that protects the dried coating against fungal degradation*. The paint film is designed to resist cracking, peeling and blistering for up to 7 years before first maintenance.

Perma-White® bonds to existing solvent-based or glossy paints. Perma-White® also seals flat paint, new drywall, cement block and concrete. It is ideally suited for any area of persistent high humidity, frequent temperature changes and poor air circulation.

productname: JG Speedfit 15mm x 25m Layflat polybutylene pipe coil
productdescription: Speedfit Layflat Polybutylene barrier pipe has even greater flexibility making the system very easy to handle and worry free. Flexibility – The pipe is ideal for long runs where a softer pipe material is an advantage so cabling through joists becomes a simple task. Easier to handle – When removed from the coil, the pipe keeps straight and ‘lays flat’ meaning there are no issues with the pipe retaining its memory and trying to coil back into place. barrier Layer – The pipe is made of 5 layers, the center of which is a coloured oxygen barrier which prevents the ingress of air into the system, reducing the effect of corrosion on metal components.

productname: JG Speedfit PEX barrier pipe length 15mm x 3m
productdescription: Speedfit lengths of barrier pipe are rigid making them easy to handle on site. Manufactured in the UK by John Guest Speedfit. The pipe is ideal for short runs where a harder pipe material is an advantage. The pipe is made of 5 layers, the center of which is a blue coloured oxygen barrier which prevents the ingress of air into the system, reducing the effect of corrosion on metal components. Due to its low thermal conductivity, when carrying hot water, Speedfit Pipe is cooler and therefore safer to touch. Note: JG Speedfit pipe inserts must be used.

productname: Hep2O 15mm x 3m Barrier Pipe Length Push-Fit
productdescription: This tamper proof straight barrier pipe from Hep2O comes with a HepKey system for easy demounting, and colour coded packaging for ease of identification. Featuring In4Sure joint recognition and SmartSleeve that stays captive in the pipe, this barrier pipe offers a secure and leak-proof alternative to the traditional copper pipes

productname: JG Speedfit 90° Equal Elbow Elbow 15mm
productdescription: Speedfit push-fit plastic fitting for the connection of plastic and copper pipe. Simply push the fitting fully onto the pipe and twist the plastic nut clockwise to lock in place. Should the need arise to demount the connection unlock the nut and push the collet towards the body of the fitting and pull the pipe to release. The fitting ensures an easier working environment in confined places and removes the need for hot works on site. Installation can be reduced by around 40% against traditional fixing methods. Note: with all plastic pipes the relevant manufacturer’s pipe insert is required. Designed, manufactured and assembled in the UK by John Guest Speedfit.

productname: JG Speedfit 90° Equal Elbow Elbow 22mm
productdescription: Speedfit push-fit plastic fitting for the connection of plastic and copper pipe. Simply push the fitting fully onto the pipe and twist the plastic nut clockwise to lock in place. productname: Hep2O 90° Equal Elbow 15mm
productdescription:
15mm 90° equal elbow for Hep2O push-fit plumbing system. 
Hep2O is not just designed to perform, built to last which is why it comes with a 50 year guarantee (twice as long as anyone else). The slim and sleek push-fit plumbing fittings work with both plastic and copper pipe and are ideal for a range of hot and cold water, and heating applications. Easy to install and with proven performance, HEP2O is the primary solution for central heating systems and hot and cold water services.

productname: JG Speedfit stop end 15mm
productdescription: Speedfit push-fit fitting for the connection of plastic and copper pipe. A must for any tool bag! The unique feature of the Speedfit concept, the ability to disconnect the fitting at will, means the Stop End provides a leak proof seal and can be removed at any stage in order to allow work to restart or allow an extension to the system. This makes the fitting the perfect tool for when water needs to be turned on, overnight for instance, or if a job suffers an interruption. Stop ends are also useful when pressure testing a system before appliances are connected. Simply push the fitting fully onto the pipe. Should the need arise to demount the connection push the collet toward the body of the fitting and pull the pipe to release. Designed, manufactured and assembled in the UK by John Guest Speedfit.
